channel.title: Possible Autoupdater
channel.description: i feel this shouldnt be too hard its just how would we go about doing it what language would be the question too ask. how i figured would be to have it when they click the run&compile.bat it would load a batch file that would check file versions and download new ones automatically... but that would be too simple because people edit their client.class and such with their own commands so im thinking we would have too make desinated update parts in each of the files and when the program sees that an updates required it would just write and save in the update area of the file

item.title: Possible Autoupdater
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

for the server but its not the version im worried about its when we make changes we edit the variable ourselfs

Read full topic

item.title: Possible Autoupdater
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

okay now that im home i rewrote this and decided what it was im talking about (yes i confused myself) what i want is that we make a autoupdater. this would be simple though we just put a version variable in the server GUI or somewhere and when a update is needed it would just tell the user they need too update

for the server or the client?

like in case they are running an old version of the server?

Read full topic

update what? the updates would have to be updating the client, and you couldnt do that from the serverside, or am I not understanding what your saying?
